trans-unit.source: Defines <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> criteria to select part-level or package-level relationships.
trans-unit.target: Define los criterios de <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> para seleccionar relaciones de nivel de elemento o de nivel de paquete.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector> is used by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign%2A> method of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager> class to specify a list of <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> parts to be signed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector> se usa por la <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign%2A> método de la <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager> clase para especificar una lista de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> partes debe estar firmado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector> is used by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignedRelationshipSelectors%2A> property of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> class to obtain a list of <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> parts that have been signed with the given digital signature.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector> se usa por la <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignedRelationshipSelectors%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> clase para obtener una lista de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> partes que se han firmado con la firma digital especificada.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> or the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> (<c>SourceUri</c>="/") that owns the relationship.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] del objeto <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> o el objeto <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> (<c>SourceUri</c>="/") que posee la relación.

trans-unit.source: The type of the <c>selectionCriteria</c>, either by relationship <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> or relationship <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: Tipo de objeto <c>selectionCriteria</c>, ya sea por la relación <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> o por la relación <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" />.

trans-unit.source: The qualification string that is used to select the relationships based on the <c>selectorType</c>.
trans-unit.target: Cadena de calificación que se utiliza para seleccionar las relaciones en función del parámetro <c>selectorType</c>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceUri" /> or <paramref name="selectionCriteria" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor de <paramref name="sourceUri" /> o <paramref name="selectionCriteria" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="selectorType" /> parameter is not valid.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro <paramref name="selectorType" /> no es válido.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="selectorType" /> parameter is <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> but <paramref name="selectionCriteria" /> is not a valid [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xsd](~/includes/tlasharptla-xsd-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: El parámetro <paramref name="selectorType" /> es <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" />, pero <paramref name="selectionCriteria" /> no es un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xsd](~/includes/tlasharptla-xsd-md.md)] de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] válido.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="sourceUri" /> is not the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> root ("/") and is also not a valid <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceUri" /> no es la raíz de <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> ("/") y tampoco es un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] de <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> válido.

trans-unit.source: The package from which to select the relationships based on the selection criteria.
trans-unit.target: Paquete en el que se van a seleccionar las relaciones en función de los criterios de selección.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> objects that match the defined <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SourceUri" />, <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType" />, and <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectionCriteria" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve una lista de los objetos <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> que satisfacen los valores de <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SourceUri" />, <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType" /> y <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectionCriteria" /> definidos.

trans-unit.source: A list of relationships that match the selection parameters specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Una lista de relaciones que satisfacen los parámetros de selección especificados en el constructor <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the selection criteria specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene los criterios de la selección especificados en el constructor <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" />.

trans-unit.source: The selection criteria based on the <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType" /> of <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> or <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Los criterios de la selección basados en la propiedad <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType" /> de <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> o <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" /> especificada para el constructor <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType" /> especificado para el constructor <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" />.

trans-unit.source: The selector type of <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> or <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: El tipo de selector de <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> o <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" /> especificado para el constructor <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the root package URI ("/") or part <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor as the owner of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el URI del paquete raíz ("/") o el valor <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri" /> del elemento especificado en el constructor <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> como propietario de la relación.

trans-unit.source: The root package URI ("/") or part <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor as the owner of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: El URI del paquete raíz ("/") o el valor <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri" /> del elemento especificado en el constructor <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> como propietario de la relación.
